mapper.insert:
insert into admin_pesticide_check (check_date, booth, category, check_project, place, check_value, result, check_user, recheck_user, check_org, remark) VALUES
(#{item.checkDate}, #{item.booth}, #{item.category}, #{item.checkProject}, #{item.place},#{item.checkValue}, #{item.result}, #{item.checkUser}, #{item.recheckUser}, #{item.checkOrg}, #{item.remark}) ;
